comments:
Steps:
Create a table
Create a group
Add an aggregate on a date with Total.distinctCount

An error is shown in preview: 
org.eclipse.birt.report.service.api.ReportServiceException: Error happened 
while running the report

Created an attachment (id=46376)
report design to reproduce the pb
